index1.Dialog: What's up? Do you dare to challenge me in any of these games?

rps.Description: Yeah, haha, come on, I can always beat you in a rock paper scissors!

4inaline.Description: How about I school you in '4 in a line'?

battleship.Description: Alright, but I seriously can't remember the last time you won in battleships.

nojusttalk.Description: I don't feel like playing, let's just talk. How are you doing?

4inaline.Dialog: Oooh let's go, I'll be blue you'be red, and come on haha... school me!

battleship.Dialog: 'All hands man your battlestaion' or whatever they say in the movies.

talk1.Dialog: I'm doing okay, the new job is taking up all my time, but I generally don't mind it.

anwser1.Description: Oh yeah, I remember, you just changed from public relations to working as an event organizer. How are you coping with that lifestyle shift?

anwser2.Description: That's nice, I hope it stays that ways. I just got home from a weekend trip in the woods.

question1.Dialog: It really couldn't be better, I really needed it. How about you, I saw that you went to a bungalow in mountains.

anwser1.Description: It was just great, just the thing I needed to charge up my battery. How is your wife doing?

anwser2.Description: Well it wasn't the greatest, I couldn't really break free from work, everybody kept bothering me.

question2.Dialog: She could be doing better, but still managing. A bit of fallout with the school board, but that luckily got worked out

anwser1.Description: I heard about teachers arguing with their board, but having it happen this close to someone you know is just scary.

anwser2.Description: Well it wasn't the greatest, I couldn't really break free from work, everybody kept bothering me.

talk3.Dialog: It really couldn't be better, I really needed it. How about you, I saw that you went to a bungalow in mountains.

anwser1.Description: It was just great, just the thing I needed to charge up my battery. How is your wife doing?

anwser2.Description: Well it wasn't the greatest, I couldn't really break free from work, everybody kept bothering me.

end.Dialog: It was nice seeing you, take care!

#pay.Description: Yeah, you too, and see you!
